resources.string:
Version: 0.1(Beta)

 Description : Ramdhan Timetable for Android

 Developer name : Win Htaik Aung

 Email: winhtaikaung76@gmail.com

وَبِصَوْمِ غَدٍ نَّوَيْتَ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ

 Wa Bisowmi Gadin Nawaytoo Min Shahre Ramadhan

 Meaning: Wa Bisowmi Gadin Nawaytoo Min Shahre Ramadhan

اللَّهُمَّ اِنِّى لَكَ صُمْتُ وَبِكَ امنْتُ [وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ] وَعَلَى رِزْقِكَ اَفْطَرْتُ \n\n Allahumma laka sumtu wa bika aamantu wa ala rizqika aftartu Meaning: O Allah! I fasted for You and I believe in You [and I put my trust in You] and I break my fast with Your sustenance.
Sehri (ဝါချည်ချိန်)
Iftari ( ဝါဖြေချိန် )

We use following libraries to develop RamdhanTimeTable

 com.android.support:appcompat-v7
 com.android.support:support-v4
 com.android.support:cardview-v7


com.jakewharton:butterknife:6.1.0
 com.squareup.retrofit:retrofit:1.9.0
 com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp:2.0.0
 uk.co.chrisjenx:calligraphy:2.1.0
 com.nineoldandroids:library:2.4.0


com.afollestad.materialdialogs
 com.rey.material.app

com.pnikosis.materialishprogress
 com.github.ksoichiro.android.observablescrollview

We use Icons and Pictures from following websites

 http://www.flaticon.com/

 http://wallpaperest.com/

We use followings for Backend InfraStructure

 Node.js
 (Backend API)Sails.js http://sailsjs.org/
 (Backend Dyno)https://heroku.com
 (Database)Postgres and Sqlite
